name: The Farmers
description:
Live a simple life of a village man. Grow crops, bake bread, take care of animals and help other people.

How to play: Plant wheat, bake bread, eat well and organize other villagers to grow the settlement as big as possible.

Controls: 
wasd - move
space - interact
(grab items for more complex interactions)

Features:

magnificient villagers AI which is totally not made of hundreds of 'if' statements ;)
minimalistic gameplay and art style
